TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4835=Unless otherwise noted below, we meet at the Des Plaines Public Library on the second Monday of the month from 7:00 to 9:00 p.m. and at the Arlington Heights Historical Society on the last Monday of the month from 7:00 to 10:00 p.m. Meetings feature either group critiques or special programs of interest to romance writers. You’re welcome to attend two meetings without obligation to join. Please note that meeting dates are subject to change due to holidays or special events., 18699=Copyright © 2015, Chicago-North Romance Writers of America®}
textBeforeTable: Learn more about joining Chicago-North RWA. Unless otherwise noted below, we meet at the Des Plaines Public Library on the second Monday of the month from 7:00 to 9:00 p.m. and at the Arlington Heights Historical Society on the last Monday of the month from 7:00 to 10:00 p.m. Meetings feature either group critiques or special programs of interest to romance writers. You’re welcome to attend two meetings without obligation to join. textAfterTable: Latest News We’re thrilled to announce that Clara Kensie’s young adult romantic thriller, Run to You, won Romance Writers of America’s RITA award for Best First Book!  Our Members B.A. Binns, Simone Elkeles, Laurie Brown Cici Edward CNRWA member Victoria Ferrera (right) with author Eloisa James Margot Justes and Pamala Knight Katherine Rapp Maureen Lang Jennifer Stevenson and Ruth Kaufman Susan Elizabeth Phillips Mission Statement We, the members of the Chicago-North Chapter of Romance Writers of America®, come together to promote excellence in romantic fiction and advance the
